query:
SELECT 
        id.image_id AS source, 
        ld.lineage_id AS target
    FROM 
        lineage_id_to_image_id ili
    JOIN 
        image_details id ON ili.image_id = id.image_id
    JOIN 
        lineage_details ld ON ili.lineage_id = ld.lineage_id
    ORDER BY 
        id.image_id
    LIMIT 10;
